author: Ground News
title: Ground News - My flight over Gaza in a plane dropping food aid
text: Jordan has been a logistics hub for humanitarian efforts since the Israel-Hamas war erupted. The Jordanian air force began airdrops into northern Summary by Ground News Gaza two weeks ago. Jordan has since flown 34 aid drops, an operation bolstered by aircraft from a burgeoning coalition. It will be weeks before the floating offshore pier that U.S. President Joe Biden announced Thursday will be ready to handle aid. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
